Key:
(Some time has passed since Miku and I started
dating. Miku's been skillfully balancing her work
and school.)

(In fact, strangely enough, ever since we started
dating, she's only shined brighter. Sure, I might
be biased, but it's undeniable.)

(Even so, it's still a grueling schedule.
Thinking that she needed a well-deserved break,
Miku and I decided to have a park date.)

Darling, hurry hurry～
Over here～

You're so spry, even though it's been a while
since you've had a day off.

Well, today's the day I can see you, after all.
All of my exhaustion just disappears.

(As Miku says this, she takes my hand. Lately,
we've been less shy about holding hands, too.
We're finally progressing as a couple.)

(There was still so much we had to learn
about one another, but with time, we'd be
able to fill in the blanks bit by bit.)

What's the matter, darling? You're spacing
out again. Is something wrong? Or has
something good happened...?

Oh, well we've been dating for a while, right?
I was wondering if we were starting to act
like a couple. The thought crossed my mind.

I want to know everything about you,
darling. I feel like I've gotten better as a
girlfriend. What do you think, darling?

Yeah. You really have become such a great
girlfriend.

(Of course, when we first started dating, she
didn't quite act like one yet.)

Hee hee. Glad to hear it. I want to continue
learning about who you are on the inside,
darling.
Yeah, of course.

(As we walk, Miku frolics about happily. Seeing
Miku feel truly comfortable is a privilege she
only gives her boyfriend.)

Miku, what do you want to do today?
Is there somewhere you'd like to go?

Let me see. I'd like to go shopping, then have
ourselves a delicious meal, and afterwards, we'll
see a movie! I heard a new one just came out...

That's quite the schedule. It'll be well past
dark by the time we're through with it all.

That's no problem at all. When the time comes,
I'll have you to escort me home, darling.

Hahaha. I guess that's true. We have to be
careful not to draw any attention.

If such a scandal occurs, I'll proudly announce
that you're my darling.

Hmm. Is that really okay? If fans catch wind of
it, won't they be angry?

It's fine. In fact, you'll have to get used to
being in the media. "So, Shido Itsuka, when were
you first attracted to popular idol, Miku Izayoi?"
Wh-What? All of a sudden?

It's a practice for being interviewed. You gotta
act cool and collected, or else it'll be a mess
whenever it eventually leaks.

That's nice of you, but I don't think it's
something I'll need to practice.

Not with that attitude. You have to clutch
the opportunity whenever it arises.

Well, I don't want it to come to that, but you
said "when", and not "if". Hmm....

I love... the smile that you show to only me.
You have such a cute way of looking at the world
that I can't help myself. Is that... enough?
....Goodness, darling!

What? I'm being totally serious!
Why are you acting so surprised?
You're being so honest, and it makes me happy.

Haha, I see. Then, could you tell me what you
like about me?

How you're kind, and have a nice personality,
and how you're amazing, and how you're kind...
Did you just say "kind" twice?

I-It's fine! Either way,
I love all of you, darling!

Yeah, me too.
I love all of you, Miku.
Hee hee... Glad to hear it.

(We shared this slightly embarrassing talk
as we headed towards the train station. First,
we shopped, then had lunch, and saw a movie.)

(Many fun things awaited us. From now
on as well.)
Darling, don't let go of this hand, okay?
Yeah. I have to hold on so you won't run away.
Yes. Never let go.
